description: This file defines an interface 'RatingOverlayHost' which provides method signatures for UI interactions related to rating overlay display and navigation actions within a media playback application. It serves as a contract for fragments or activities to implement, ensuring standard behavior for showing overlays and navigating to different screens.

classes.name: RatingOverlayHost
classes.description: An interface specifying hooks for showing a rating overlay and navigation within a media playback context.

methods.name: showRatingOverlay
methods.description: Method to display the rating overlay UI.

methods.name: navigateToVcard
methods.description: Method to navigate to a vCard or post-rating detail screen.

methods.name: showEndPlayer
methods.description: Method to return to the end player or main playback area.
